vista.graph
Class AxisDataSetMediator

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.AxisDataSetMediator

public class AxisDataSetMediator
extends java.lang.Object

Mediates information flow between an axis and data sets. This will promote loose coupling by centralizing the relationship between the axis and the data set. The axis should only be concerned with the scaling and not with the data sets which are used to come up with that scaling. And the data sets should only be concerned with the data and not the axis to which they might be attached

Version:
$Id: AxisDataSetMediator.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:49 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu (DWR).
